meanings.definition: A group or set of seven things.
meanings.sent1: She collected septenaries of colorful stones from the beach.
meanings.sent2: The store sold septenaries of pencils in different colors.
meanings.sent3: The septenaries of flowers in her garden bloomed beautifully together.
meanings.sent4: The septenaries of books on the shelf formed a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The septenaries of ducks waddled in a line behind their mother.

meanings.sent1: They celebrated their anniversary every septenaries with a special trip.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization believed in the cycle of septenaries.
meanings.sent3: The septenaries of drought were finally broken by a heavy rain.
meanings.sent4: The septenaries of plenty were followed by years of scarcity.
meanings.sent5: The septenaries of peace were shattered by the outbreak of war.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or relating to the number seven.
meanings.sent1: The septenaries candles on the cake flickered in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The septenaries colors of the rainbow are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
meanings.sent3: The septenaries stars in the sky formed a perfect constellation.
meanings.sent4: The septenaries notes in the musical scale created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The septenaries days of the week each have their own unique charm.
